com.here.mobility.sdk.demand

Class DemandClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.mobility.sdk.core.net.GrpcClient
      • com.here.mobility.sdk.demand.DemandClient

  • public abstract class DemandClient
extends GrpcClient
    The client class for accessing the demand API - requesting, booking and managing rides.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  DemandClient.RideUpdateListener
      Listener to be implemented by the caller, to get notifications about Ride updates.

      • cancelRide

        @NonNull
public abstract ResponseFuture<java.lang.Void> cancelRide(@NonNull
                                                                   java.lang.String rideId,
                                                                   @NonNull
                                                                   java.lang.String reason)
        Cancels an active or future ride.
        Parameters:
        rideId - the id of ride to be cancelled
        reason - reason for the cancellation
        Returns:
        ResponseFuture object which can be used to control the invocation time. This request has no return value. Check for the status of the ride to make sure the cancellation was processed successfully.

        public void registerToRideUpdates(@NonNull
                                  DemandClient.RideUpdateListener listener)
        Register to ride updates. The listener will be called on the looper of the thread calling this method.
        Parameters:
        listener - DemandClient.RideUpdateListener to be called on updates.
